testcase.name: get - when a Subject is requested, it must be returned()
get - when a Subject is requested and not found, an exception must be thrown()
list - when the repository returns a list of Subjects, they must be returned()
persist - when a Subject is persisted, it must return the persisted entity()
persist - when a Subject is persisted and a constraint was violated, an exception must be thrown()
getByName - when a Subject is requested and not found, an exception must be thrown()
list - when the repository returns an empty list of Subjects, an empty list must be returned()
getByName - when a Subject is requested, it must be returned()
delete - when a Subject should be deleted but was not found, an exception must be thrown()
